posts.title: ubuntu时区设置
posts.text: ubuntu时区设置1. 查看可以设置的时区ls -R --group-directories-first /usr/share/zoneinfo 12345678910111213141516/usr/share/zoneinfo/right/Asia:Aden Bishkek Gaza Kashgar Muscat Sakhalin TomskAlmaty Brunei Harbin Kathmandu Nicosia Samarkand Ujung_PandangAmman Calcutta Hebron Katmandu Novokuznetsk Seoul UlaanbaatarAnadyr Chita Ho_Chi_Minh Khandyga Novosibirsk Shanghai Ulan_BatorAqtau Choibalsan Hong_Kong Kolkata Omsk Singapore UrumqiAqtobe Chongqing Hovd Krasnoyarsk Oral Srednekolymsk Ust-NeraAshgabat Chungking Irkutsk Kuala_Lumpur Phnom_Penh Taipei VientianeAshkhabad Colombo Istanbul Kuching Pontianak Tashkent VladivostokBaghdad Dacca Jakarta Kuwait Pyongyang Tbilisi YakutskBahrain Damascus Jayapura Macao Qatar Tehran YekaterinburgBaku Dhaka Jerusalem Macau Qyzylorda Tel_Aviv YerevanBangkok Dili Kabul Magadan Rangoon ThimbuBarnaul Dubai Kamchatka Makassar Riyadh ThimphuBeirut Dushanbe Karachi Manila Saigon Tokyo 中国就选择 Asia/Chongqing 既可以 2. 修改时区timedatectl set-timezone Asia/Chongqing ok date看一下时间正常了 参考http://askubuntu.com/questions/323131/setting-timezone-from-terminal

posts.title: rest_api_template 接口文档模板
posts.excerpt: 接口名 接口描述 URL /a/rest/ Method: PUT
posts.text: 接口名 接口描述 URL /a/rest/ Method: PUT URL Params Required: id=[String] ID Data Params Required: desc=[String] 描述 Success Response: Code: 200 Content: 12345{"success": true,"msg": "提交成功!","timestamp": 1464318030110} Error Response: Error: 房源不存在 Content: 123456{ "success": false, "msg": "房源不存在!", "err_code": "", "timestamp": 1464318083587} OR Error: 价格不能为空 Content: 123456{ "success": false, "msg": "价格不能为空!", "err_code": "", "timestamp": 1464318083587}
